message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe we can reach a better agreement. I am willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $950,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $980,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. I'm open to further discussion, but I'm also prepared to walk away if we can't reach an agreement.

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand your position, but I would like to propose $960,000 as a compromise. I believe this price reflects the value of the product to me while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
